106.issue: [E106] "common.titleLang" must not have ioBroker in the name. It is clear, for what this adapter was created. 157.issue: [E157] js-controller 2.0.0 listed as dependency but 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please update dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

172.issue: [W172] "common.localLink" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.localLinks": { "_default": "..." }

184.issue: [W184] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

190.issue: [E190] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/io-package.json).

522.issue: [S522] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig).

029.issue: [E029] Node.js 18 is required as minimum, node.js 20 is recommended. Please change "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '0.10' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json).

033.issue: [E033] @iobroker/adapter-core 2.6.8 specified. 3.2.3 is required as minimum, 3.3.2 is recommended. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json)

035.issue: [E035] No devDependency declared for @iobroker/testing. Please add "@iobroker/testing":"5.0.4" to devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json)

036.issue: [E036] @alcalzone/release-script 3.6.0 specified. 3.8.0 is required as minimum,  3.8.0 is recommended. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json)

038.issue: [E038] Attribute "licenses" in [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json) is deprecated. Please remove and use "license": "NAME" attribute.

060.issue: [E060] uid-number listed as dependency and as optionalDependency.

050.issue: [W050] 'request' package is deprecated and no longer maintained. Please consider migrating to package 'axios'.

051.issue: [W051] "maintainers" attribute at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.terminal/blob/master/package.json) is not documented. Please use "contributors" attribute.
